RawLine:
READ_0107815,甘青活血湯：主排毒，有活血去熱之效。
配方：谷密菜二兩。谷密菜，菜蔬類，性甘甜，生於藥王谷大廳前院。

龍躍解毒湯：主四肢解毒，有通脈去寒之效。
配方：水蛇茅一錢。水蛇茅，形如細根狀，只生於谷內水源之處。

降魂續命湯：主全身淨血，有去毒去寒之效。
配方：醉魂葉半斤。醉魂葉，小株圓葉，食之麻舌，只生於谷內橋南村落。

此類方劑內服後未得根治者，需以藥浴之，以內力將毒驅出體外，方可完治。,甘青活血汤：主排毒，有活血去热之效。
配方：谷密菜二两。谷密菜，菜蔬类，性甘甜，生于药王谷大厅前院。

龙跃解毒汤：主四肢解毒，有通脉去寒之效。
配方：水蛇茅一钱。水蛇茅，形如细根状，只生于谷内水源之处。

降魂续命汤：主全身净血，有去毒去寒之效。
配方：醉魂叶半斤。醉魂叶，小株圆叶，食之麻舌，只生于谷内桥南村落。

此类方剂内服后未得根治者，需以药浴之，以内力将毒驱出体外，方可完治。

Items.mt:
Glycyrrhiza glabra soup: Mainly for detoxification, with the effect of activating blood circulation and removing heat. <
>Recipe: 2 taels of Chinese cabbage. It is sweet in nature and is grown in the front courtyard of Medicine King Valley Hall. <
><
>Long Yue Detoxification Soup: It is used to detoxify the extremities, and has the effect of opening the veins and removing cold. <
>Formula: Water Snake Maw, one coin. Water snake fungus, shaped like a small root, only grows in water sources in the valley. <
> <
>Subduing the soul and renewing life soup: Mainly for purifying the blood of the whole body, with the effect of removing poison and cold. <
>Formula: Half a catty of drunken soul leaves. It is a small plant with round leaves, which can be eaten with a numb tongue, and is only grown in the villages south of the bridge in the valley. <
><
>For those who have not been cured after taking this formula internally, they need to bathe in the medicine to expel the poison out of their bodies with internal force.
